items.content_html: Cookier is a lightweight, customizable cookie consent banner that informs users about cookie usage. It includes a simple "accept" button and a link for more information about cookies.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.
items.title: YashRajput09/BlogBreez: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: The Queue Backend API is a lightweight Node.js and Express service that provides a RESTful endpoint for fetching queue items with timestamps. It supports CORS and includes a query parameter for API key simulation. Easy to set up, this API is designed for seamless integration with front-end applications.
items.title: mohamadsabori/Queue-Backend-API: The Queue Backend API is a lightweight Node.js and Express service that provides a RESTful endpoint for fetching queue items with timestamps. It supports CORS and includes a query parameter for API key simulation. Easy to set up, this API is designed for seamless integration with front-end applications.
